sentences.en: A plastic sheet was pegged down over the compost heap to hasten decomposition.
sentences.cn: 把塑料布覆盖在肥堆上,并用木桩固定好,以加速肥料的分解.

sentences.en: Both humification and decomposition are impeded.
sentences.cn: 腐殖化过程与分解过程均受到抑制.

sentences.en: Combustion at high temperature causes decomposition to nitrogen and water.
sentences.cn: 氨在高温下燃烧分解成为氮和水.

sentences.en: If all the dissolved oxygen is used, an anaerobic ( without air ) decomposition process occurs.
sentences.cn: 如果耗尽了溶解氧, 就会发生厌 气性 分解过程.

sentences.en: Initiation is caused by radicals produced from azobisisobutyronitrile, benzoyl peroxide or perester decomposition.
sentences.cn: 链引发是由偶氮二异丁腈, 过氧化苯甲酰或过氧酯分解生成的自由基所引起.

sentences.en: It is said that the magnetite was formed by a chemical process called thermal decomposition.
sentences.cn: 据说这枚陨星是在热分解的化学过程中形成的。

sentences.en: Occasionally we shall make use of the following decomposition of the displacement vector.
sentences.cn: 有时候,我们将利用位失量的下列分解式.

sentences.en: One of the earliest means of raising was mulch decomposition.
sentences.cn: 最早增加?值姆椒ㄊ抢?用地面覆盖肥料的分解.

sentences.en: So no one decomposition is sufficient.
sentences.cn: 因此一种分解是不够的。

sentences.en: Soil organic matter is the product of microbial decomposition of plant and animal residues.
sentences.cn: 土壤有机质是微生物分解植物和动物残体的产物.

sentences.en: The decomposition of a radioactive element is the simplest example of a true first order reaction.
sentences.cn: 放射性元素的衰变是真正一级反应最简单的实例.

sentences.en: The dehydration process leads to fairly extensive decomposition of the product.
sentences.cn: 脱水过程会导致产物相当程度的分解.

sentences.en: The final process in organic matter decomposition is known as humification.
sentences.cn: 有机物分解的最后程序称为腐殖质化.

sentences.en: The goal of retting is to bring about decomposition of the pectin.
sentences.cn: 浸渍的目的就是在于使果胶质分解.

sentences.en: These plastics are organic compounds and so we subject to decomposition by heat.
sentences.cn: 这些塑料都是有机合成物,因此易为热所熔化.

sentences.en: This is an important difference, because it means that the additional transaction decomposition can be turned on only when required.
sentences.cn: 这是一个很重要的不同点，因为这意味着仅仅在需要时才进行附加的事务分解。

sentences.en: This type of thermal decomposition is called pyrolysis.
sentences.cn: 这种类型的热分解反应称做热解.

sentences.en: Unlike other decomposition solutions, due to this algorithm, there are no constraints that allow only sibling or child elements/attributes to be mapped to the same table.
sentences.cn: 由于有了此算法，与其他的分解解决方案不同，没有只允许将兄弟或孩子元素/属性映射到同一个表的约束。

words.tran_cn: 再混合的；与混合物混合的

phrases.tran_cn: 频谱分解；频谱分析；谱相分解；谱表示
旋节线分解；斯宾那多分解；亚稳态分解，亚稳相分离

trans.tran_en: Decomposition is the process of decay that takes place when a living thing changes chemically after dying
